title: Kurban Höyük
description: Site in eastern Anatolia inhabited from the Neolithic-Middle Bronze Age. The site was excavated in the early 1980s prior to being inundated by the construction of the Atatürk Dam in 1990.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate original location of Kurban Höyük, derived from a Vici.org location.
properties.title: Vici.org location of Kurban Höyük
